option.value: <![CDATA[<component name="ProjectRunConfigurationManager"> <configuration default="false" name="LineaEmpaqueApp" type="Application" factoryName="Application"> <option name="MAIN_CLASS_NAME" value="actividad_1.LineaEmpaqueApp" /> <module name="tss" /> <option name="VM_PARAMETERS" value="--add-modules javafx.controls,javafx.fxml,javafx.swing" /> <extension name="coverage"> <pattern> <option name="PATTERN" value="actividad_1.*" /> <option name="ENABLED" value="true" /> </pattern> </extension> <method v="2"> <option name="Make" enabled="true" /> </method> </configuration> </component>]]>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <component name="ProjectRunConfigurationManager"> <configuration default="false" name="LineaEmpaqueApp" type="Application" factoryName="Application"> <option name="MAIN_CLASS_NAME" value="actividad_1.LineaEmpaqueApp" /> <module name="tss" /> <option name="VM_PARAMETERS" value="--module-path "C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\org\openjfx\javafx-base\21.0.2;C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\org\openjfx\javafx-graphics\21.0.2;C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\org\openjfx\javafx-controls\21.0.2;C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\org\openjfx\javafx-fxml\21.0.2;C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\org\openjfx\javafx-swing\21.0.2" --add-modules javafx.controls,javafx.fxml,javafx.swing,javafx.graphics" /> <extension name="coverage"> <pattern> <option name="PATTERN" value="actividad_1.*" /> <option name="ENABLED" value="true" /> </pattern> </extension> <method v="2"> <option name="Make" enabled="true" /> </method> </configuration> </component>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
@echo off setlocal
set JAVAFX_PATH=C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\org\openjfx set JAVAFX_MODULES=--module-path "%JAVAFX_PATH%\javafx-controls\21.0.2;%JAVAFX_PATH%\javafx-graphics\21.0.2;%JAVAFX_PATH%\javafx-base\21.0.2;%JAVAFX_PATH%\javafx-fxml\21.0.2;%JAVAFX_PATH%\javafx-swing\21.0.2" --add-modules javafx.controls,javafx.fxml,javafx.swing
java %JAVAFX_MODULES% -cp "target\classes;%JAVAFX_PATH%\javafx-controls\21.0.2\*;%JAVAFX_PATH%\javafx-graphics\21.0.2\*;%JAVAFX_PATH%\javafx-base\21.0.2\*;%JAVAFX_PATH%\javafx-fxml\21.0.2\*;%JAVAFX_PATH%\javafx-swing\21.0.2\*;C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\ca\umontreal\iro\simul\ssj\3.3.1\*;C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\org\jfree\jfreechart\1.5.5\*;C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\org\apache\commons\commons-math3\3.6.1\*;C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\com\formdev\flatlaf\3.5.2\*;C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository\com\google\code\gson\gson\2.10.1\*" actividad_1.LineaEmpaqueApp
endlocal

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
@echo off echo ======================================== echo Ejecutando LineaEmpaqueApp con JavaFX echo ======================================== echo.
setlocal
REM Configurar rutas set JAVA_HOME=C:\Users\olive\.jdks\graalvm-jdk-21.0.7 set JAVA_EXE=%JAVA_HOME%\bin\java.exe set PROJECT_DIR=%~dp0 set CLASSES_DIR=%PROJECT_DIR%target\classes set M2_REPO=C:\Users\olive\.m2\repository
REM JavaFX module-path set JAVAFX_MODS=%M2_REPO%\org\openjfx\javafx-base\21.0.2;%M2_REPO%\org\openjfx\javafx-graphics\21.0.2;%M2_REPO%\org\openjfx\javafx-controls\21.0.2;%M2_REPO%\org\openjfx\javafx-fxml\21.0.2;%M2_REPO%\org\openjfx\javafx-swing\21.0.2
REM Classpath (otras dependencias) set CP=%CLASSES_DIR%;%M2_REPO%\ca\umontreal\iro\simul\ssj\3.3.1\ssj-3.3.1.jar;%M2_REPO%\org\jfree\jfreechart\1.5.5\jfreechart-1.5.5.jar;%M2_REPO%\org\apache\commons\commons-math3\3.6.1\commons-math3-3.6.1.jar;%M2_REPO%\com\formdev\flatlaf\3.5.2\flatlaf-3.5.2.jar;%M2_REPO%\com\google\code\gson\gson\2.10.1\gson-2.10.1.jar
echo Java: %JAVA_EXE% echo Module-path: %JAVAFX_MODS% echo. echo Iniciando aplicación... echo.
REM Ejecutar con module-path "%JAVA_EXE%" --module-path "%JAVAFX_MODS%" --add-modules javafx.controls,javafx.fxml,javafx.swing,javafx.graphics -cp "%CP%" actividad_1.LineaEmpaqueApp
if %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( echo. echo ======================================== echo ERROR: La aplicación terminó con código %ERRORLEVEL% echo ======================================== echo. echo Si ves "JavaFX runtime components are missing": echo - Verifica que Maven haya descargado JavaFX 21.0.2 echo - Ejecuta: mvn clean install echo. pause ) else ( echo. echo ======================================== echo Aplicación finalizada correctamente echo ======================================== )
endlocal
